code.displayName: advice to carer regarding child's behaviour

pertinentSupportingInfo.value: If James' wheeze returns she is to contact the surgery immediately. James is to avoid contact with anybody who has Chickenpox over the next 3 months. If he does have contact he should be seen ASAP.
